channel.title: Comments on: Fairmoney Loan Apk – Borrow Loan Free From Collateral

item.title: By: Hardeywarlex

item.description:
In reply to <a href="/fairmoney-loan/#comment-1227">Tosinbliss</a>.
Is the bvn upto 11 digit?
Are you sure the bvn you input is correct?

In reply to Tosinbliss.

Is the bvn upto 11 digit?

item.title: By: Tosinbliss
